title: Dark Roast Coffee
description: This coffee is for people who truly appreciate those classic flavors that only a dark roast can give you. The darker roast brings out notes of molasses, spice and earthy. Enjoy!

title: Decaf Coffee
description: Don’t want to be putting unnecessary chemicals in your coffee? Then make sure you drink this decaf coffee! It utilizes a water-based process to make certain your coffee is not only decaffeinated but tasty! Our decaf has flavors of spice and syrup and finishes with a tasty candied apple.

title: Medium Roast Coffee
description: This medium-roasted coffee is a great way to start your day. It is wonderfully balanced and, if you really try, you just might be able to pick up on the delicious notes of citrus, caramel, and nougat.
